fullplot: A group of teenagers including Cindy Campbell and Bobby Prinze, accidentally hit a man when driving, and dispose of the body, but now they are being stalked by a very recognisable masked killer. The victim count increases, whilst Cindy must survive the carnage that has she has seen in so many films before.
plot: A year after disposing the body of a man they accidently killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.
title: Scary Movie

tomatoes.consensus: Critics say Scary Movie overloads on crudity and grossness to get its laughs.
